description: Regional dishes including home-made pastries and desserts, as well as meat and salumi from the family’s own farm, are to the fore in this typical restaurant with beautiful wooden furnishings created by a local artist. Part of the Post Hotel situated in the centre of the village (in the traffic-limited zone), the restaurant is open non-stop from 11am-10pm and doesn’t take bookings.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
